AmazonEC2::reset_image_attribute ( $  image_id  ) 

Reset Image Attribute

Resets an attribute of an AMI to its default value.

public

Parameters:
string $image_id (Required) Unique ID of a machine image, returned by a call to register_image() or describe_images().
Returns:
TarzanHTTPResponse
See also:
http://docs.amazonwebservices.com/AWSEC2/2007-03-01/DeveloperGuide/ApiReference-Query-ResetImageAttribute.html
